entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Toronto
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:17 p.m. EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 6.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 1:19 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
Condition: Light Rain

Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 16 km

entry.title: Wednesday: Wet flurries at times heavy or rain showers. High 7 with temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain showers beginning this afternoon then changing to wet flurries at times heavy later this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High 7 with temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Wet flurries at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Wet flurries at times heavy ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
